job.title: Senior Staff Engineer- IT Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Samsung is a world leader in Memory, LCD and System LSI technologies. We are currently looking for exceptional software and hardware talent to join our Samsung Austin R & D Center (SARC) in Austin, TX and our Advanced Computing Lab (ACL) in San Jose, CA. SARC was established in Austin, TX in 2010 to be one of Samsung’s strategic investments in high performance low power ARM based device technology. Presently our GPU design teams, located in Austin (SARC) and San Jose (ACL), are developing a GPU that will be deployed in Samsung mobile products.  Our System IP team located in Austin (SARC) is working on Coherent Interconnect and memory controller architectures.
As a Site Reliability Engineer you will be a highly experienced, skilled, and driven engineer with a strong understanding of the CI/CD lifecycle, cloud native technology, and legacy software systems. You have likely been an application Software Engineer in the past and have gained a deep understanding of infrastructure and operations, or have been a Systems Administrator with extensive experience across technologies who has spent the last few years learning modern automation and cloud native infrastructure skills.
You must enjoy working alongside solution owners, systems architects and software engineers to maintain and improve a highly available, highly-scalable IT infrastructure platforms.
You must be able to troubleshoot production issues, implement automation tools and frameworks (CI/CD pipelines), collaborate with team members to improve the existing and develop new engineering tools, optimize company’s computing architecture, manage infrastructure, and design and conduct security, performance, and availability tests.
You will report to the Enterprise IT Senior Manager and work in close collaboration with Networking, Data Services, Engineering (CAE), and InfoSec.
